body.p: SIC‑8 First‑time Application of IASs as the Primary Basis of Accounting, issued in 1998, dealt with matters that arose when an entity first adopted IASs. In 2001, the Board began a project to review SIC‑8. In July 2002, the Board published ED 1 First‑time Application of International Financial Reporting Standards, with a comment deadline of 31 October 2002. The Board received 83 comment letters on ED 1. IFRS 1 was issued by the Board in June 2003.
